TextView.android:text: I can remmeber when i met my boyfriend to this day like it was nothing. I had just came home from being out with some friends and all of a sudden, someone knocks at my door and it was one of my friends and him. Well we caught each others eyes from then. I could not take my eyes off of him. Well i remember he took me to Ryan's clear across the water from my house. He was a really nice guy, and then we went out on a few more dates and now we have been together for almost two years. i have never met someone like him before so he was really special to me and i would not give him up for anything. I remeber that day like it was yesterday
